item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“vbcoderx, post:24, topic:220204”]@mopman

Other funny thing is, that xkcd strip was about how drinking DOES make you code better. Unless you have a natural .13 BAC?

if you would read it well… it says its a delicate thing, and too much alcohol fucks it, hence why windows me is soo much more fail than the other windows oses… obviously the programmers drank too much and faild… frank_ drinks too much… why he’s always an asshole…

@Yz85Racer
lol… you obviously don’t realize how nooby you made your look… sudo apt-get install is the easiest way to install anything in ubuntu… if you’d bother to check… its not hard…
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=installing+apache+on+ubuntu&btnG=Google+Search
oh shiat that was hard… :-p[/quote]
Other than the fact I posted that as soon as I got Kubuntu working, SURE! Despite the fact I didn’t even know the console then.

Also, the fact you called frank_ an asshole made me laugh, actually. When was the last time you spoke to frank_ one on one? Sure he is a little ragey, but it’s funny. I love how people think he’s unapproachable, despite the fact he is one of the most approachable people on the forum, just don’t be a fucktard upon asking him the question.

item.title: #504 Output please
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:22, topic:220204”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=289191.msg2337691#msg2337691 date=1216183844]

noone cares about rsca members

it seems this is part of some efficency drive, like a few updates ago, they removed entity.height and just used animable.height in its place, there was both those fields already there and they mostly had identical values in them, so removing one of them also improved its efficency
[/quote]heh, my imagination always failed me when giving names to those two fields, perhaps i should wait a few months then start refactoring again

Just Follows pd’s naming solutions. Does anyone know how to contact pd?

Franks room:

Frank thinks drinking makes him code better.
The Facts:
http://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/ballmer_peak.png

Funny thing is, frank_ doesn’t drink.

Next retarded insult?

http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=570999

Hey. I’m running AMD-64, and I need a web server, I can’t find any for 64-bit

http://youtube.com/user/Yz85Racer[/quote]
You’ve proved you can stalk!

Also, I know I asked for a Web server, I even did here omg…

Whilst you’re snooping around for my accounts, why not find my Motocross.com account? It’s name is Yz85Racer. 9999 every account I have is called Yz85Racer, so, effectively you haven’t achieved much, though I must congratulate you ruler, this is the first time you’ve actually got something right, even though there was nothing to be gotten.

Are you angry you failed your University course?

item.title: #504 Output please
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

Well over the last few weeks i have doved into client hacking. I have avoided client hacking since the death of aryan and the after effects I felt.

Alot of past people are no longer here and so is any recognition.

Alot of people have contributed directly or indirectly Including:

Richyt
Regex, Sean, pd, eXemplar
semaphore
Waffendennis
pplsuqballz
ruler
benland100
yakman
KryptoN_
frank_
SilverLining
zstars
Zappacky, Iamadams
ace
vbcoderx
Speljohan , Qauters
Ollie

I just spent the last few minutes reading thru some very old topics on this forum trying to find who actually wrote some of the hooks.

I am looking at updating the about on nexus to:


[ul][li]iBot - ruler[/li][li]neXus - ruler[/li][li]Input Bot - ruler[/li][li]Paint Bot - ruler[/li][li]log4J - http://logging.apache.org/log4j/docs/[/li][li]SWT - http://www.eclipse.org/swt/[/li][li]sqlitejdbc - http://www.zentus.com/sqlitejdbc/[/li][li]Client Analysis - yakman, regex, pd, pplsuqbawlz[/li][li]Client Deob/Analysis 317/377 - pd, regex, moparisthebest[/li][li]Client Deob 503 - Popcorn, Qauters, Speljohan[/li][li]BCEL Hooks - pplsuqbawlz, regex, ruler, Silver Lining, vbcoderx, Ollie[/li][li]BCEL Assistance - vbcoderx, illusion[/li][li]Updater Design - ruler, pplsuqbawlz, frank_, White Castle[/li][li]OCR Bitmaps - capndurk, SCAR[/li][li]Orignal Mouse Splines - benland100[/li][li]Orignal WorldMap Image - benland100[/li][li]Orignal Applet Stub - regex[/li][li]Orignal Server List - eXemplar[/li][li]Orignal Class Loader - Sean[/li][li]SCAR String Compression Theory - Ace[/li][li]Strange Box - semaphore[/li][/ul]

I am looking for information on who actually did what in Ollies updater.

Read full topic
